p.b: Please select the campus where you would like to take the PC Exam. The campus selection below only displays the campuses that are offering PC Exams currently.
Please select the PC Exam type that you would like to take. The Exam type selection below only displays the PC Exam types that are currently available.

form.label: I accept the Terms and Conditions

div.h3: Are you a prior or current CharterQuest (CQ) student?

ul.li: Select ‘’Yes’’ if you have studied with CQ before or have booked/paid now/recently to study with CQ (NB. subject to dial-back email authentication)
Select ‘’No’’ if you have never studied with CQ before and/or have NOT booked now/recently to study with CQ.
Please note: Once selected ‘’Yes’’ Our PC Exam team will communicate with you and confirm via email your Student status.

p.b: If you already paid for your exams with your enrolment you should have received a voucher to book your exams. In the event that you paid your fees and does not have a voucher please click “Pay Vie EFT” and follow instructions in the email to be sent to you.

ul.li: Please note that all * required information must be submitted to complete your PC Exam booking.
Your information is confidential and protected under our Privacy Policy.
